ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] Bronze
ygData.msgSnippet: Back in the day, small bronze was found in unrest on drybones. thats where we first got ours, and large bronze from the ogre captain in najena... ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Back in the day, small bronze was found in unrest on drybones. thats where
we first got ours, and large bronze from the ogre captain in najena...
----- Original Message -----
From: "(Lasombra Shadowfiend)" <vtemplarv@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, March 03, 2000 12:29 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] Bronze


> From: "(Lasombra Shadowfiend)" <vtemplarv@...>
>
> I am bored at work, so bear with me please. :-)
>
> What is the best place to find Small Bronze? I have heard Drybones in
> Lakerathetear by SK, and Unrest by not a specific mob. Would anyone here
> please point me in a specific direction? The DB in LRathe are camped 24/7
> and I'd care to not get in line on a MoB that gives me no xp. Thanks.
>
> --
> Lasombra
